channel.title: All jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All jobs as of June 13, 2024 18:31 UTC

item.title: Content creator- Dutch - Upwork
item.description:
Hey content creator,

Are you ready to work for us? We are looking for someone who can provide us with the best content ideas for short videos (with a strong focus on TikTok). With your content ideas and scripts, we want to build a loyal community for our business.

Job Description:

- You will come up with the best content ideas for our clients (different niches).
- You will write the scripts in fluent Dutch.
- We will film the videos ourselves (at the client's location).
- You will stay in contact with our editor to fine-tune the editing process and bring your vision to life.
- You will provide the winning hashtags.

Bonus points if you can also develop phenomenal content strategies!

This job opening could become full-time later on. For the beginning, it would be between 10-20 hours per week. If you would like to hear more about our business, we welcome you to introduce yourself to us and find out if we are a match. Please make sure to include your rates when reaching out.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 13, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Script, Dutch, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, English
Skills: Script, Dutch, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Writing, English
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Production for Spa Advertisement - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled video producer who can create an engaging and informative video showcasing our spa and services. The video will be uploaded to YouTube and will serve as an advertisement for our business. The ideal candidate should be proficient in video editing software, powerpoint, and have a creative eye for capturing the essence of our spa and services. We can provide videos, pictures and content.

   Responsibilities:
   - Create a captivating video that highlights the unique features of our spa and services
   - Incorporate visuals, music, and voiceover to create a compelling narrative
   - Ensure the video is of high quality, with clear visuals and crisp audio
   - Edit and refine the video based on feedback from our team

   Skills required:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Creative storytelling abilities
   - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

   This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level video producer who has prior experience in creating promotional videos for businesses.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 13, 2024 18:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Shorts/Reels/Tiktok Editor - Upwork
item.description:
HEY VIDEO EDITORS!

We are looking to DOMINATE social media with engaging short-form content

Calling All Editing Wizards:
* You have to be able to create amazing short form videos (15-45s) that capture and mesmerize.

NEED TO KNOW:
* How to edit high-quality, engaging videos that help build a brand.
* Premiere Pro and After Effects.
* How to communicate effectively and QUICKLY via chat.
* How to speak and write in English.
* How to be on top of your game!!!!!

Rookies, Stand Down:
If you’re not ready to create some NEXT-LEVEL short-form content, you’re not ready for us...

Compensation: $20 per short-form video.
MINIMUM of 30 videos/month, hopefully scaling to 90 videos/month

Growth: If you like the type of environment where you learn, grow, and give it your all... You will go far!

Join us on our mission to make some irresistible content!

Budget: $20

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Video Editor with design skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor with design skills to join our team. You will be responsible for editing video for various platforms, including web, YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok, and creating captivating and eye-catching thumbnails. You should have a deep understanding of video editing techniques and be familiar with the best practices of each platform. The ideal candidate will have a strong attention to detail, creativity, and good knowledge on how to shoot better videos.

Skills required:

- Video editing
- Thumbnail design
- Knowledge of web, YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok best practices

We're right at the start of our video-making journey and we're looking to develop a long-term relationship with someone as we grow the business. Also interested in perhaps utilising new AI tools to more quickly increase the volume of videos.


Posted On: June 13, 2024 18:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Ad needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We are working on an App idea. We have almost finalized the basic version. It's just 2 of us working part time on it but we think creating a small ad around it will help us to showcase people more clearly. We have the idea and the story that we would like to get build under 1 minute. This will require Video Production, editing skills. Since the app is based out of India, we only want Indian talent at this stage

We would like to talk to you and see if you would be interested and how much it will cost us. Let me know if you would be interested,

item.title: Video Editor for Basketball Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled video editor to join our team. You will be responsible for editing raw footage into easy to follow and engaging videos that align with our brand and vision. You should have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work independently.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit raw footage and audio to create high-quality videos
  - Ensure videos are easy to follow, visually pleasing, and engaging
  - Improve clip quality using Topaz AI or other program

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a video editor
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Proficient in audio editing
  - Strong creative and storytelling skills
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Excellent communication skills

If you have a passion for storytelling through video and possess the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you. Please include samples of your previous work when applying.


Posted On: June 13, 2024 17:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.title: Video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor Wanted!
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our team. Your tasks will include:

Video Editing: Assemble provided images and clips into cohesive videos.
Voiceover Integration: Sync voiceovers with video content.
Subtitles: Add subtitles for accessibility.
Background Music: Choose and add suitable background music.
Requirements:
Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Attention to detail and creativity.
Strong communication and time management skills.
What We Offer:
Flexible working hours (remote work).
Competitive pay.
Opportunity for creative input and growth.

I will be giving a keynote talk at a conference and want to capture video of the talk.

There will be no editing, just capturing the keynote and sharing the raw footage with me.

We will need two camera, one stationary, one roaming.

The audio can be connected through the AV team as I will be mic'd up for the presentation.

item.title: Japanese and English speaking UGC content creator for promoting apps - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Content Creator who speaks fluent Japanese and English. In this role, you will be responsible for producing 1-4 engaging and culturally relevant user-generated content (UGC) for our app. You will have the opportunity to showcase your creativity and linguistic skills while contributing to the growth and success of our platform.

Responsibilities:
- Create compelling UGC in Japanese that resonates with our target audience.
- Generate innovative ideas for game-related content, including gameplay tutorials, tips and tricks, challenges, and more.
- Collaborate with our content team to develop strategies for engaging our Japanese-speaking user base.

Requirements:
- Fluent proficiency in Japanese and English, both written and spoken.
- Knowledge of popular gaming platforms and social media trends (TikTok, Instagram).
- Excellent communication and storytelling skills.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
- Ability to fully edit UGC content, including adding captions, implementing gameplay videos, etc.
- Prior experience in user generated content creation.

Usage rights:

- You grant us and our advertiser the right to use, distribute, and broadcast the video you have created across all digital channels including, but not limited to, social media, and digital advertising platforms.
- The rights mentioned above shall be granted for a period of one (1) year from the date you agree to these terms.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 13, 2024 17:52 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Comedy, Humor, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Ad Content Creation, Acting, Social Media Ad Campaign
Skills: Social Media Video, Comedy, Humor, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Ad Content Creation, Acting, Social Media Ad Campaign
Country: United States

item.title: Managing the social media accounts of our fashion brand - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a person to manage the social media accounts of our women fashion brand.

We have an extensive amount of videos and pictures which needs to be scheduled on our social media platforms. However they are raw which means they need slight editing and coloring.

I am not interested in creating graphics. Our brand is high-end and only posts high-end pictures with models.

You will be in charge of:
- selecting and editing the pictures and videos to use for the social media posts
- scheduling posts, reels, posts, stories...etc.
- managing the highlights
- making sure to tag the products in the posts. We carry about 80 products at the moment in our web store.
- increasing the engagement on our accounts

So far we only use instagram and Facebook, but we are open to also open other accounts.



Posted On: June 13, 2024 15:30 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Marketing Strategy

We are seeking a talented video editor with a specialty in design to join our team. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience working with the Adobe suite and possess a keen eye for visual aesthetics. As a video editor, you will be responsible for creating engaging and professional videos that align with our brand image. You will collaborate closely with our creative team to bring concepts to life through editing, color correction, and motion graphics. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines is crucial. If you have a passion for storytelling through video and possess the necessary technical skills, we would love to hear from you!

We work in Monday for project management, so experience with that software is a plus!

item.title: Create Minecraft Shorts / TikTok/ video editing / with AI voice - Upwork
item.description:
= FAST EPLXAINED =

You need to be able to create videos from scratch that look exactly like this:
- https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1bBv9NXJJgBmSGEQOmmGqykYuodblqNxZ?usp=sharing
they are made with AI voice, maybe you can guess which one.

You should copy content from example channels (I will provide them for you) or make it very similar, you can also create your own content, but that takes longer. Write down a script, play it in Minecraft and put an AI voice over it. Edit the whole video so that it gets as many clicks as possible. The purpose of the videos is to build a personal brand and promote my server at the same time.

YES, YOU NEED TO PLAY MINECRAFT.
AND I NEED A EXAMPLE VIDEO AS YOUR APPLICATION.
AND YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND ENGLISCH VERY WELL TO EVALUATE YOUR OWN CONTENT.


= LONG DETAILED EXPLAINED =

I want you to start building a new English-speaking social media account using Minecraft & AI voice to promote my Minecraft server.

You will receive a TikTok account as a sample template, which you should simply copy 1-to-1. Maybe with a few changes so that I don't get penalised. I'll then upload it to my account and that's it.

1. find a sample video from the sample channel
2. download the video and turn it into a script
3. start a recording on OBS with best 9:16 settings
(look on tiktok minecraft videos how they do it)
4. go into Minecraft and convert the video while speaking the text so that you can use the AI voice better later on
5. generate the voice according to our specifications with ElevenLabs (the text should also be in your script)
6. open CapCut and enter the Minecraft video and the AI voice there
7. cut everything together so that it looks 90% like the example, maybe even better with more  effects, things happening, and so on...
8. send me the video

I need 3 videos every day, you can do this every day or produce everything in one go, it's just important to me that I can upload 3 every day.

You will probably also need a filming partner to help you record classic trolling videos. Just someone who owns Minecraft and runs around with you on my server. That's it.

= PAYMENT =

I want you to have a vested interest in making the videos as good as possible and think about how to get even more clicks. This is a full-time job with opportunities for advancement. So a bigger income.

I want you to earn money from this account in the future.
This means that you will also earn a certain percentage of clicks.
For example, you could say that 20% of the advertising revenue and placements will go into your pocket and we will increase this up to 50% depending on how well you work. That can easily be $1,000 to $5,000 if the videos are well clicked. But first the account has to be monetised, which will take a few weeks or maybe months.

Understandably, you only earn money for as long as you work for me.
But if you do a good job and the channel grows, I see this as a collaboration for the next 5 to 10 years.
Why should I stop working with a system that works?

Currently the monthly payment is 300$, but this is also variable. Depending on how good your work is, it can range from $200 to $400.

Salary increases are also possible, but this has to get off to a good start and work for me.

= YOUR APPLICATION =

I can best assess your work if you finish a video and simply send it to me. Then I'll know straight away whether you're suitable for the job or not.

You should copy two different kinds of this video here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1bBv9NXJJgBmSGEQOmmGqykYuodblqNxZ?usp=sharing

Maybe you can even manage to make the video better. By that I mean sound effects, better editing, more elements for a dopamine kick for the viewer.

= IMPORTANT =

Please consider this your full-time job.
I don't want you to do other things on the side, as I want to give you opportunities for advancement and a second job.

So if you get one account running well, maybe we can duplicate the whole thing and you can take care of content for two accounts.

You decide with your work what hourly wage you get. If you find a good method/workflow, you might have produced 6 videos in just 5 hours. That would be great, of course.

You'll probably already notice how time-consuming it is with your application video and how much potential there is for optimisation.

Finding a good example account can save you a lot of time writing your video script or a good prompt on ChatGPT for video ideas.

Finding certain settings in the editing software (CapCut) can help you create your next videos much faster. You don't have to search for sound effects if you already have a few, fonts, music and so on. Of course, you always have to be on the lookout for something new, but not for everything. LEMONMILK, for example, is a good font, but please bring your own creativity to it.

You have a chance to build up a really good income here.


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 13, 2024 17:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Gameplay Footage, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Gameplay Footage, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Germany
click to apply

You need to be able to create videos from scratch that look exactly like this:
- https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1bBv9NXJJgBmSGEQOmmGqykYuodblqNxZ?usp=sharing

item.title: Up and coming Video Editing assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a up and coming video editor  to help create clips for social platforms.

We produce a weekly podcast and have a need to create clips for over 400+ podcast shows.

Looking for someone who has some experience video editing already but doesn't have to be years of experience.

We will identify the clips(time stamps) and have turn it into clips.
These will be very basic and straight forward most of the time and will not require any sophisticated editing, especially in the beginning.  

Looking for someone with a great attitude.
Good English skills are a must, communication will be very important.

I would prefer someone that is less than 4 hours different in my time zone which is EDT.

item.title: Video editing - Upwork
item.description:
We run several YouTube Automation channels, also known as "Cash Cow channels", and we're looking for a video editor.

Our videos usually are 8-12 minutes long. We will pay $25 for 5 videos ($5 for each video), with the possibility of renewal of the contract once the first 5 videos are completed.

The process will go like this: we will send you the script, the narration, and clear step-by-step instructions with everything you need to know about the topic and how to make the video so that you can edit without any problem or doubt.

You will download footage for that topic, and you will add it together with the narration and create a video. Then, you will send the final video to us.

If you're interested, please include some samples of your past work so we can decide if you're a good fit. If you don't have samples, we will provide the first topic with a script and a voiceover for you to edit.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 13, 2024 17:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor/Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of an experienced video editor or preferably a video creator for YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong creative vision and the ability to produce high-quality videos that align with our brand and target audience. You will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding transitions, visual effects, sound effects, and music to enhance the overall video quality. Additionally, you will be required to create engaging and eye-catching thumbnails for each video. Time management and attention to detail are crucial in meeting project deadlines. Knowledge of YouTube SEO and best practices is a plus.

Skills required:

- Video editing
- Creative storytelling
- Visual effects
- Sound design
- Music selection
- Thumbnail design
- Time management
- Attention to detail

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level professional with proven experience in YouTube video editing and content creation.

item.content:encoded:
We are in need of an experienced video editor or preferably a video creator for YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong creative vision and the ability to produce high-quality videos that align with our brand and target audience. You will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding transitions, visual effects, sound effects, and music to enhance the overall video quality. Additionally, you will be required to create engaging and eye-catching thumbnails for each video. Time management and attention to detail are crucial in meeting project deadlines. Knowledge of YouTube SEO and best practices is a plus.

Skills required:

- Video editing
- Creative storytelling
- Visual effects
- Sound design
- Music selection
- Thumbnail design
- Time management
- Attention to detail

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level professional with proven experience in YouTube video editing and content creation.

Hello!

We are looking to update the below video as it is from 2021 and replace it with new footage from 2024.

Here is the original video we are looking to update: https://deckstar.box.com/s/cbwo1rc2rhbxweizqakc1o186khw47og

Here is a document that has all the edits and additions we are looking to make: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lF-6lsc3UOdo2ym_fykzu4OLCg33Vuywn3ldUfUI1Kk/edit?usp=sharing


For a lot of these additions, I have the download links for you to download the files, but for others I have provided the links and you will need to rip them from the given site.

NOTE: we don't have the project file, you will need to use the MP4 version of 2021

Write "Deal" at the beginning of your proposal so I know you read all
